name: PulsePoint
overview:
Poised at the intersection of audience and content, PulsePoint helps agencies and marketers target and serve relevant ad placements across screens – from display and video to social and mobile. Leveraging our award winning ESP platform, PulseConnect, PulsePoint also helps brand marketers – across all verticals – to manage the customer life cycle through the delivery of personalized messaging across email, mobile and social.

For publishers, PulsePoint enables smart revenue opportunities via our top rated ad exchange and innovative RTB solutions. Utilizing real-time audience measurement and content classification technologies PulsePoint also helps publishers increase the value of their direct sales by layering in-depth insights about their audience and the types of content consumed.

Another distinct advantage PulsePoint delivers to both marketers and publishers are social publishing solutions for content marketing needs. Powered by patent-pending technology that ensures quality content at scale, our social publishing platform harnesses a global network of 500,000 citizen journalists to curate unique content and amplify a brand’s and site’s voice.
